name: Zeliria Sanctuary
description: Sense of reality has not yet returned after a teleportation experiment. Purple hamsters, girls with tails, medieval knights - a fantastic world of an alien planet, where you will lead special forces soldier...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8 Processor: Intel atom Z3xx (Silvermont) Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series. 1280x720 or better required DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 850 MB available space Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (64bit ver) Processor: Core i5 of Ivy Bridge generation or better or AMD Ryzen 5 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: AMD or Nvidia (VRAM 1GB or better). Recommended 1920x1080 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound
